contract_details.description: Comprehensive code quality cleanup focusing on linting errors, import optimization, and code standards compliance. Fix all identified linting issues, remove unused imports, and ensure V2 compliance standards are met.
contract_details.background: Agent-3 specializes in configuration management and code quality. This contract leverages that expertise to systematically clean up code quality issues while maintaining functionality and performance.
objectives: Fix all E501 line too long errors (>88 characters)
Fix all E402 module level import not at top of file errors
Fix all F401 unused import errors
Fix all F841 local variable assigned but never used errors
Fix all E722 bare except clause errors
Fix all E712 comparison to True should use 'if cond is True:' pattern
Fix all F821 undefined name errors
Ensure all Python files follow V2 compliance standards
Validate no regressions introduced during cleanup
deliverables: Clean import statements across all modules
V2 compliance report showing 100% standards adherence
technical_requirements: Flake8 linting with V2 compliance rules
success_criteria: Zero linting errors across all Python files
All imports properly organized and optimized
All stakeholders approve code quality improvements

network_unlocks: Access to Quality Assurance Working Group

contract_history.details: Created comprehensive code quality cleanup contract for Agent-3
